structured_data.summary: Reject packets where TLON equals ∞ or NaN
structured_data.additionalNotes: This rule ensures that only valid TLON values are processed.

structured_data.summary: Enforce TLON value between −180 and 180 degrees
structured_data.additionalNotes: Values outside the range trigger ERR_406 to maintain positional integrity.

structured_data.summary: Log TLON validation failures to orbit_ep_nulls
structured_data.additionalNotes: Captures invalid TLON events for operational visibility and debugging.
